greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of divisors of n that are either 1 or not a perfect power.
comment: First differs from A183095 at a(80) = 8, A183095(80) = 7.
example: The a(72) = 8 divisors of 72 that are either 1 or not a perfect power are {1, 2, 3, 6, 12, 18, 24, 72}. Missing are {4, 8, 9, 36}.
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, May 18 2018
